channel.title: snack on Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in snack on Cookbook

item.title: Hot and Spicy Chex Mix
item.description: Ingredients 3 cups corn Chex 3 cups rice Chex 1 cup mixed nuts 1 cup pretzels 1/4 cup butter 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce 1 tablespoon red pepper sauce 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon chili powder 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper Directions preheat over to 250 degrees mix cereal, nuts, and pretzels in a large mixing bowl; set aside melt butter, stir in Worcestershire sauce, spices, and hot sauce pour butter mixture over cereal, stir to evenly coat spread in a parchment paper lined baking sheet bake 1 hour, stirring every 20 minutes; cool

item.title: Oat Bars
item.description: Ingredients 1 1/4 cups peanut butter 1/2 cup honey 3/4 cup shredded coconut 8 teaspoons sunflower seeds 8 teaspoons flax seeds 1/2 cup raisins 2 1/2 cups rolled oats Directions melt peanut butter and honey together mix in everything else except the oats mix in the oats flatten out in a square baking dish refrigerate for 1 hour slice into bars refrigerate for another hour store in an airtight container
